snippet: A mother of a child at an Upper West Side elementary school learned of the December episode while perusing a Department of Education report about PCBs posted online.
abstract: New York City Education Dept apologizes to parents of an Upper West Side elementary school for failing to inform them of a faulty light fixture in a classroom that leaked PCBs, which have been linked to serious health problems; parents, elected officials and teachers' union all express dissatisfaction with apology and say they will hold news conference to demand more answers and swifter accountability.
lead_paragraph: A mother of a child at an Upper West Side elementary school learned of the December episode while perusing a Department of Education report about PCBs posted online.

headline.seo: City Apologizes for Not Informing Parents of School PCB Leak
headline.main: New York City Says It Erred by Not Telling Parents of School PCB Leak
headline.print_headline: City Says It Erred by Not Telling Parents of School PCB Leak
